Articles.Content:
Awesome multiplayer game(with older co-op version too http://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/575163 )

2D game, great maps,great weapons game still in early stages just like KSP!

i think there are only 2 Devs so theres the difference.

Game is free,it has a great community if not counting in McSpud or ZIXME.

Download it free from here: http://mythologicinteractive.com/Games/SuperfightersDeluxe.aspx

Note,once SFD is installed,you need to download SFD 1.2.1 from the launcher. you need to wait just little longer until they release mega update,physics improvement,melee system fixing and moving platforms
